definition: to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
to visit/to call on/to seek/to inquire/to investigate

sentences.english: I have visited many blogs of Sina lately, and my blog had some visitors.
sentences.chinese: 近來訪問了很多新浪博客，同時也得到一些博友來訪。

sentences.english: The visitor hammered against the door with his fists.
sentences.chinese: 來訪者用拳頭使勁地錘打着大門。

sentences.english: Her plan to go shopping was nipped in the bud when visitors arrived unexpectedly.
sentences.chinese: 有客人突然來訪，使她上街購物的計劃落了空。

sentences.english: It protects US officials there and guards visiting congressional delegations.
sentences.chinese: 在那裏，它保護美國官員和來訪的美國國會代表團。

sentences.english: But families at Fort Hood said afterwards they ­appreciated Obama's visit.
sentences.chinese: 但在胡德堡家屬們隨後都表示感激奧巴馬來訪。

sentences.english: Some of them are spaceships from outer space.
sentences.chinese: 有些不明飛行物是外太空來訪的太空船。

sentences.english: He looks forward to Jiang's visit to the U.S. in fall this year.
sentences.chinese: 我期待着今秋在美國接待江主席來訪。

sentences.english: Ghannouchi warmly welcomed Jiang's visit on behalf of the Tunisian government.
sentences.chinese: 加努希代表突尼斯政府對江主席的來訪表示熱烈歡迎。

sentences.english: President Kirchner held a grand welcoming ceremony for President Hu upon his visit.
sentences.chinese: 基什內爾在這裏爲胡錦濤來訪舉行隆重的歡迎儀式。

sentences.english: And I was struck, as many visitors are, by the transformation that had taken place.
sentences.chinese: 我像很多來訪者一樣，被今昔的變化所震撼。

sentences.english: A: I've come about your offer for bristles.
sentences.chinese: 我今天來訪的目的是想聽取你方對豬鬃的報盤。

sentences.english: The caller complained, “I’ve been sad all my life.
sentences.chinese: 來訪者控訴道，“終其一生，我都悲傷難抑。

sentences.english: We shall have the pleasure of welcoming your visiting soon.
sentences.chinese: 倘於近日能歡迎您來訪，我們將感到快樂。

sentences.english: Peope have shown great interest in his disappearance due to alien visits.
sentences.chinese: 由於外星人來訪人們對他的失蹤表現出極大的興趣。

sentences.english: It is diplomatic protocol for all visiting heads of state to lay a wreath here.
sentences.chinese: 所有來訪的國家元首敬獻花圈都是外交禮儀。

sentences.english: When you have visitors, check them out and make sure they belong.
sentences.chinese: 有來訪者時，對他們進行檢查並確認他們的身份。

definition: to pay a visit/to call on
to visit/to call on/to seek/to inquire/to investigate
to seek by inquiry or search/to call on/to visit
to carry/to take along/to bring along/to hold (hands)/also pr. [xi1]
to interview/to gather news/to hunt for and collect/to cover
